showScoreExcerpt:
“Too much of the insistently rhythmic music lacks variety, the best moments coming in the klezmer sequence and in Clarke’s tear-down-the-house, eleven o’clock number, “Lot’s Wife”… Still, this isn’t a show with takeaway songs. Caroline, or Change’s two hours and 15 minutes are overlong, but by the time it ends, you’ll understand why it’s here and why now couldn’t be a better time to have it around.”

Read more
